channel.title: Help with a hard command to me
channel.description:
[center] [b]Help With a command can you do it [/b][/center]
[center] Can somone help me When i command on ::mod It will popup with like a quest box and says you have to own mod to be a mod[/center]

item.title: Help with a hard command to me
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

qsmith:

no it says seenquest that is a message that show in your message screen. my way makes it pop up on a paper that goes on to your screen (like that quest mues in the real rs)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 26, 2007, 04:25:59 PM[/size][hr]opps i just mad no cents sry but thats the same thing i told him

Dude you have no idea what your talking about…

Did you not see the void to bring menu up?

public void commandHelp() { sendQuest("@dre@Commands", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@dbl@YOUR ARE NOT A MOD!!!!!!!!!!", 8147); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream();

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("mod") && playerRights >=0) { commandhelp(); )

I can also get you the link were i gave this other guy same info and it worked…

Read full topic
item.source: Help with a hard command to me

item.title: Help with a hard command to me
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

public void commandHelp() { sendQuest("@dre@Commands", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@dbl@YOUR ARE NOT A MOD!!!!!!!!!!", 8147); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("mod") && playerRights >=0) { commandhelp(); )

Or you could just make it send a message like so…

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("mod") && playerRights >=0) { sendMessage("YOUR NOT A MOD NOOB!!!!!"); )

Read full topic
item.source: Help with a hard command to me

item.title: Help with a hard command to me
item.dc:creator: @qsmith qsmith
item.description:
@qsmith wrote:

o lol… he was so confusing.

search for this in your clint.java:

public int IPPart4 = 1;

then under that add this:

public void ModHelp() {
sendFrame126("@dre@Moderator Helpmenu", 8144); //Helpmenu title
clearQuestInterface();
sendFrame126("", 8145);
sendFrame126("@red@you have to own mod to be a mod", 8146);

then with you mod command under that add

ModHelp()

Read full topic

(“mod”)

now when you see it look for something like ________() that onder that (it could be any word befor that () so just delet the _______() and that wont pop up.
:)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 26, 2007, 04:04:52 PM[/size][hr]o just got to your char file and change your rights to 3.
